questions.question: What is the chemical formula of ZJU-25?
What method was used to measure the N2 sorption isotherms for ZJU-25?
questions.answer: A Micromeritics ASAP 2020 surface area analyzer was used to measure N2 sorption isotherms.

questions.question: What was the heating rate during the Thermogravimetric analyses (TGA) for ZJU-25?
questions.answer: The heating rate during the TGA for ZJU-25 was 10 oC min-1.

questions.question: What is the relationship between the volumetric surface area of porous MOFs and their methane uptake capacity at 35 bar and ambient temperature?
questions.answer: Porous MOFs with volumetric surface areas in the range of 1000 to 1500 cm2/cm3 exhibit high methane uptake at room temperature and 35 bar.

questions.question: Is the crystal system of ZJU-25 hexagonal?
Does the synthesis of the organic linker H4FDDI involve Suzuki coupling followed by hydrolysis and acidification?
Was the BET surface area of ZJU-25 determined to be 2124 m2/g?
Does the methane storage capacity of ZJU-25 meet the DOE target of 180 cm3(STP) cm-3 at room temperature and 35 bar?
Was the crystallographic data for ZJU-25 collected using an Oxford Xcalibur Gemini Ultra diffractometer?
Is the framework topology of ZJU-25 derived from the nbo topology?
What is the role of the SQUEEZE subroutine in the structure determination of ZJU-25?
questions.answer: The SQUEEZE subroutine was used to remove the scattering from the highly disordered guest molecules in ZJU-25.

questions.question: How was the isosteric heat of adsorption for ZJU-25 calculated?
questions.answer: The isosteric heat of adsorption for ZJU-25 was calculated using a virial type expression to fit the combined CH4 isotherm data.

questions.question: What was the purpose of guest-exchanging the fresh sample of ZJU-25 with dry acetone?
questions.answer: The purpose was to have a guest-free framework of ZJU-25 before conducting gas sorption measurements.

questions.question: What was the yield of the organic linker H4FDDI after its synthesis?
questions.answer: The yield of H4FDDI after its synthesis was 97%.

questions.question: What was the crystal size of ZJU-25 as reported in the crystallographic data?
questions.answer: The crystal size of ZJU-25 was 0.48x0.45x0.09 mm3.

questions.question: Did the synthesis of ZJU-25 involve heating a mixture of H4FDDI and Cu(NO3)2Â·2.5H2O in DMF/H2O at 60oC for 72 hours?
Was the elemental analysis for ZJU-25 performed on an EA1112 microelemental analyzer?
Does the methane storage capacity of ZJU-25 decrease at higher temperatures?
Is the density of ZJU-25 calculated to be 1.192 g/cm3?
What was the initial isosteric heat of CH4 adsorption in ZJU-25?
questions.answer: The initial isosteric heat of CH4 adsorption in ZJU-25 was approximately 15.1 kJ/mol.
